sections.heading: Possessors
sections.text: of mining claims deemed lawful owners of ores therefrom.

sections.heading: Purchasers
sections.text: in good faith deemed owners of ores.

sections.heading: Notice
sections.text: to purchasers of their liability; institution of action to enforce title.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text: of claimant for failure to institute action after service of notice.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text: of purchaser after notice and institution of action.

sections.heading: Payment
sections.text: for ores within 30 days after delivery, sale or settlement; penalty.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
to change value of ore, substitute ore or issue false bill of sale or

certificate of purchase; penalty.

sections.heading: Examination
sections.text:
of books of assayer and purchaser upon affidavit of theft or other unlawful

taking.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text:
for failing to keep books, making false entries or refusing to allow

inspections.

sections.heading: Failure,
sections.text: refusal or neglect of assayer or purchaser not to operate as excuse or defense.

sections.heading: Assayers
sections.text: to identify bullion or amalgam; penalty for refusal or neglect to comply.

sections.heading: Statement
sections.text:
required in certain documents containing results of assay; penalties;

enforcement.
